name: Gandalf
description: A wise and powerful wizard, clad in grey robes, wielding ancient magic and a staff of great power.

inventory.name: Staff of Power
inventory.description: A gnarled wooden staff imbued with arcane energy, capable of channeling powerful spells.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points, healing minor wounds.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: You create three glowing darts of magical force that unerringly strike their targets.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: A bright streak flashes to a point and detonates, engulfing the area in flames.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.description: A stroke of lightning forms a line, dealing damage to creatures in its path.

spells.name: Shield
spells.description: An invisible barrier of magical force protects you, increasing your AC temporarily.
